claim_card.claim: Operational protocols are provided to estimate the Φ-invariant from finite-resolution data in three test-beds (turbulence, Bose gases, superconducting qubits), producing a Φ(t) trace whose plateau duration Δτ and height Φ* are framed as direct falsifiers.
claim_card.test_hook: Implement all three protocols on at least one dataset each; report Φ(t), Δτ, Φ* and whether a plateau exists under stated preprocessing.
claim_card.evidence_excerpt: All protocols output a Φ-trace ... plateau duration Δτ and height Φ⋆ are direct falsifiers
